title: Validator: Could not get rough time result: lookup caesium.tannerryan.ca: Temporary failure in name resolution
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Validators throwing the below errors and causing the earning to drop to close 0% on the hourly tracker. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? This seems to be intermittent as I upgraded my node to alpha.24 today. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction No special changes between alpha.23 vs. alpha.24. ## üî• Error 

time="2020-09-01 08:06:28" level=error msg="Could not get rough time result: lookup caesium.tannerryan.ca: Temporary failure in name resolution" prefix=roughtime

097a56784 slot=200428
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** Ubuntu latest.
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** alpha.24
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** https://medalla.beaconcha.in/dashboard?validators=12425,12433,12437,12442,12446,12456,12457,12461,12465,12469,12473,12474,12477,12480,12487,12490,12493,12499,12504,12509,12511,12516,12521,12525,12527,12532,12542,12544,12552,12567,12568,12569,12574

This may just be a temporary down time whether it is your internet or on the remote. 

Does this link work for you? caesium.tannerryan.ca
@terencechain - The link is working for me. It's probably just a hiccup from the ISP in my area. Thanks.
